title: OPPO A54 (Moonlight Gold, 128 GB)  (6 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, USB Cable, Charger, SIM Ejector Tool, Protective Case, Quick Start Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Display Features: 60 Hz Refresh Rate, 120 Hz Touch Sampling Rate, 89.2% Screen-to-Body Ratio, Color Saturation: 65% (Min), 70% (Typ) NTSC, 20:09 Aspect Ratio, Contrast Ratio: 1500:1, Brightness: 480 nits, 550 nits (Typical Value Under Sunlight), Night Mode, Eye Comfort, NEG T2X-1 Glass Protection
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Rear Camera Setup: 13 MP Main (3.46 mm Focal Length, f/2.2 Aperture) + 2 MP Macro (1.77 mm Focal Length, f/2.4 Aperture) + 2 MP Bokeh Camera, Photo Editing Options: Crop and Rotate, Adjust, Filter, Markup, Text, Mosaic, Beautify, Stickers, Eraser, Blur
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 16 MP Front Camera (Samsung S5K3P9, f/2.0 Aperture, FOV 79.3 Degree, 5P Lens, 4:3 Aspect Ratio, 1/3.1 Inch Lens,1.0 um Pixel Size), Camera Mode: Photo, Video, Expert, Panoramic, Portrait, Night, Macro Camera
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Rear Camera: 1080p and 720p (at 30 fps), Slow-motion: 720P (at 90 fps), Video Zoom: 1080p and 720p (at 30 fps), Front Camera: 1080p and 720p (at 30 fps)
product_specification.Other Features: eMMC5.1 ROM, FAT32, NTFS, EXFAT OTG Storage Formats, 2 TB Maximum OTG Storage Supported, 9V/2A Standard Charger Power, IPX4 Waterproof Rating Enough for Daily Routine, Side Fingerprint Unlock
product_specification.Warranty Summary: Brand Warranty of 1 Year Available for Mobile Including Battery and 6 Months for Accessories

product_description.Powerful and Reliable Performance: The OPPO A54 is a reliable and powerful smartphone that features a high capacity battery for uninterrupted performance, a fast-charge function to quickly boost the battery life, and up to 128 GB storage capacity to store various files.
product_description.Feature-rich Smartphone: This OPPO smartphone comes with multiple impressive features, such as a 5000 mAh Battery, 18 W Fast Charge, up to 128 GB of ROM, a 16.55 cm (6.51) punch-hole Display, AI-enhanced Selfies, and a sleek and durable body.
product_description.Long-lasting Battery: You can enjoy up to 19.9 hours of online content streaming and up to 41 hours of uninterrupted music on this smartphone, thanks to its 5000 mAh battery.
product_description.Super Power Saving Mode: When this OPPO smartphone’s battery drops to below 10% of charge, the Super Power Saving Mode is activated to keep you connected.
product_description.18 W Fast Charge: The Type-C connector boosts the battery life of this smartphone easily and quickly.
product_description.Optimized Night Charging: This OPPO A54 comes with an AI-optimized overnight charging feature. So, when you leave the phone on charge at night, once it is charged to 80%, this feature pauses charging. Then, before you wake up, the battery is charged to 100%.
product_description.Seamless Performance: This is a powerful smartphone that runs on a MediaTek Helio P35 processor. Also, its Octa-core CPU can deliver up to 2.3 GHz speed for fast launching and switching of apps even while playing games. Also, it has a three-card slot (dual SIM and MicroSD).
product_description.3D Delicate Design: A premium back-cover design, along with a 0.2 mm thinned midframe and a delicately created 3D body, makes it a sleek and stylish smartphone.
product_description.Side Fingerprint Unlock: This smartphone learns the user’s daily phone-use preferences, then accordingly reacts to the natural motions of the user to easily unlock the screen. Also, the Face Access feature lets you unlock this device with just a glance.
product_description.Wide Display: This smartphone features a 16.55 cm (6.51) HD+ Punch-hole display that covers the edges of this smartphone to offer vivid shades and a distraction-free viewing experience. Also, it has an 89.2% screen-to-body ratio.
product_description.Automatic Light Adjustments: This OPPO smartphone has a smart Sunlight Screen and Moonlight Screen. It automatically adjusts the lighting to offer a comfortable tone. Also, the Eye Comfort Mode makes it a suitable option for your vision.
product_description.16 MP Selfie Camera: Click HD selfies with this smartphone that features a 16 MP selfie camera. Also, the AI triple rear camera improves your photography skills.
product_description.AI Algorithms: This feature automatically adapts to the skin tone and ambient light to let you click customised selfies having a naturally charming effect. So, you can capture beautiful and attractive selfies with every click.
product_description.2 MP Macro Lens: This lens captures the beauty of tiny subjects. You can capture vivid details of small subjects even from a few centimeters distance.
product_description.2 MP Bokeh Camera: This camera highlights your beauty by blurring the background accurately. The AI-enhanced bokeh makes you the center of focus.
product_description.Reliable Built: The IPX4-rated waterproofing as well as lab-tested resistance to radiation, slight drops, temperature changes, and other conditions, make this a reliable smartphone. This device undergoes 20,000 USB port plug-in tests, 28,000 10-cm drop tests, 150,000 volume button tests, and 500,000 power button tests to ensure that it lasts for a long time.
product_description.Color OS 7.2: This operating system makes it a user-friendly device for easy functioning. This smartphone also has a Black Screen Mode to let you enjoy music without watching videos to save battery life.

review:
Overall the phone is good.
Have bought Starry Blue color and it looks beautiful.
There is a glow/ reflection in the light that makes it stand out.
Camera is above average and the shots taken capture good detail . Night / low light shots are strictly average. Battery is excellent.
Box includes a soft case.
Side finger print sensor unlocks fast if used correctly else it is hit or miss. For fast unlocks you will have to ideally use the right hand thumb.
Audio is good but A53 was better as this doesn't have dual stereo speakers.
This doesn't support 5G - for that buy A53S
